refnamediv.refpurpose: Perform sliding phase vocoder algorithm with simplified transformational FM using GPU hardware. Experimental and only available as source code at the moment.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin in cuda. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins

para.para: Perform sliding phase vocoder algorithm with simplified transformational FM using GPU hardware.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iwinsize -- The DFT size in samples. Need not be a power of two. ifftsize determines the number of analysis bins used.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: amod -- signal that modulates the analysed signal.
